summary: Completed frontend testing of CAPTURE PWA - Hackathon V2 Update (Bannerghatta Road satellite map). All 11 of 13 features verified working. Fixed bug with undefined handleBrandClick function. Single/double click on territory polygons could not be fully verified via Playwright due to SVG click detection limitations.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: handleBrandClick function was undefined but called in Marker and Popup button click handlers. Changed to use handleBrandSingleClick and handleBrandDoubleClick respectively.
seed_data_creation: None required - brand territories are hardcoded in GameContext.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features verified. The single/double click on territory polygons should work after the fix but couldn't be fully tested via Playwright due to SVG click detection. Manual testing recommended for click interactions.

esri_satellite_tiles.details: Map uses Esri World Imagery tiles (https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/). 80+ tiles loaded.

map_centered_bannerghatta.details: Map centered on Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore (12.8988, 77.6006). Cross Road labels visible (11th, 12th, 13th Cross Road, etc.)

map_zoom_constraints.details: Default zoom 16, min zoom 14, max zoom 19. Verified via zoom out test.

map_panning_restricted.details: Map bounds restricted to Bannerghatta area (north 12.92, south 12.87, east 77.63, west 77.57)

seven_brand_territories.details: All 7 brand territories visible: MuscleBlaze (Decathlon, Meenakshi Mall, Hulimavu Gate), SuperYou (Arekere Signal, IIM), TheWholeTruth (Vega City, Jayadeva Flyover)

tracking_sheet_3_metrics.details: Tracking sheet shows Distance (0.00 km), Duration (00:00), Avg Pace (--:-- min/km)

bg_indicator.details: BG (background) indicator with green dot visible when capturing

gps_quality_bars.details: GPS quality bars indicator visible when capturing (4 bars showing signal strength)

pause_resume_end_buttons.details: Pause/Resume and End buttons visible when capturing

orange_gradient_start_button.details: Start Capture button has orange gradient (from-amber-500 to-orange-500)

layer_toggle_button.details: Layer toggle button works - cycles through satellite, streets, dark views with toast notification

single_click_flyto.details: Code logic verified correct. handleBrandSingleClick triggers flyTo with zoom 18. Could not fully test via Playwright due to SVG polygon click detection.

double_click_scratch_card.details: Code logic verified correct. handleBrandDoubleClick opens scratch card after flyTo animation. Could not fully test via Playwright due to SVG polygon click detection.

bug_fixed.issue: handleBrandClick function was undefined but called in Marker and Popup button click handlers
bug_fixed.fix: Changed Marker click handler to use handleBrandSingleClick and handleBrandDoubleClick. Changed Popup button to use handleBrandDoubleClick.
bug_fixed.impact: Clicking on brand markers and 'Claim Reward' button in popup would have caused JavaScript errors

mocked_apis.authentication: User login/signup is MOCKED - any email/password works
